channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- API Connect
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- API Connect

item.title: CVE-2018-1389|2024-08-05T03:59:38.816Z -- ibm -- api%20connect
item.description: IBM API Connect 5.0.0.0 through 5.0.8.2 is impacted by generated LoopBack APIs for a Model using the BelongsTo/HasMany relationship allowing unauthorized modification of information. IBM X-Force ID: 138213.

item.title: CVE-2018-1430|2024-08-05T03:59:39.087Z -- ibm -- api%20connect
item.description: IBM API Connect 5.0.0.0 through 5.0.8.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 139226.

item.title: CVE-2018-1468|2024-08-05T03:59:39.089Z -- ibm -- api%20connect
item.description: IBM API Connect 5.0.8.1 and 5.0.8.2 could allow a user to get access to internal environment and sensitive API details to which they are not authorized. IBM X-Force ID: 140399.

item.title: CVE-2018-1382|2024-08-05T03:59:38.896Z -- ibm -- api%20connect
item.description: IBM API Connect 5.0.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 138079.

item.title: CVE-2018-1469|2024-08-05T03:59:39.148Z -- ibm -- api%20connect
item.description: IBM API Connect Developer Portal 5.0.0.0 through 5.0.8.2 could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute system commands using specially crafted HTTP requests. IBM X-Force ID: 140605.
